channel.title: CVE Feed for Unisoon -- UltraLog Express

item.title: CVE-2020-3921|2024-08-04T07:52:20.541Z -- unisoon -- ultralog%20express
item.description: UltraLog Express device management software stores userâ€™s information in cleartext. Any user can obtain accounts information through a specific page.

item.title: CVE-2020-3920|2024-08-04T07:52:20.408Z -- unisoon -- ultralog%20express
item.description: UltraLog Express device management interface does not properly perform access authentication in some specific pages/functions. Any user can access the privileged page to manage accounts through specific system directory.

item.title: CVE-2020-3936|2024-08-04T07:52:20.524Z -- unisoon -- ultralog%20express
item.description: UltraLog Express device management interface does not properly filter user inputted string in some specific parameters, attackers can inject arbitrary SQL command.
